Midnight Lace

Ano: 1960

IMDb ID: tt0054084

Classificação: 6.7

Sinopse: American heiress Kit Preston (Doris Day) has been married for three months to a British executive, Anthony 'Tony' Preston (Sir Rex Harrison). During a foggy evening in London, she is walking across Hyde Park when she is threatened by a strange voice that tells her that she will be murdered soon. The next day, Kit receives a phone call from the stalker threatening to kill her in the next month. She and her husband go to Scotland Yard, but Inspector Byrnes (John Williams) believes that Kit is making up the story to get more attention from her husband. Kit's Aunt Bea (Myrna Loy) arrives, but only Kit receives the phone call, raising the question: is she losing her mind?—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
